subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pinch-hitter Corey Brown drove in the winning run with a single in the bottom of the 10th inning Saturday, lifting the host Washington Nationals to a 7-6 victory over the Miami Marlins.
snippet: Pinch-hitter Corey Brown drove in the winning run with a single in the bottom of the 10th inning Saturday, lifting the host Washington Nationals to a 7-6 victory over the Miami Marlins.
